description: This file implements the advanced operations for managing HTTP status codes and reason phrases within the HttpAtoStatus Object. It includes functions for creating code and name tables, retrieving status codes by reason phrase, and retrieving reason phrases by status code.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAtoStatusCreateCodeTable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Creates the atom table for HTTP status phrase codes. Currently, the implementation is a placeholder that always returns success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAtoStatusCreateNameTable(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Creates the atom table for HTTP status phrase names. It adds predefined HTTP status code-and-phrase pairs to the object.

methods.name: ULONG HttpAtoStatusGetAtomCode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * name)
methods.description: Retrieves the status code associated with a given reason phrase by searching the atom table.

methods.name: char * HttpAtoStatusGetAtomName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG code)
methods.description: Retrieves the reason phrase associated with a given status code by searching the atom table.
